author: Donny Mahoney
title: 'Brendan Dolan Took Every Chance I Gave Him' Says Gutted Gerwyn Price
text: Fermanagh's Brendan Dolan has stormed into the last 16 of the World Darts Championships with a huge upset win over fifth seed Gerwyn Price on Thursday evening. It was beautiful revenge for the 'History Maker' who [fell to Price in this competition in a sudden death leg](https://www.pdc.tv/news/2023/12/28/price-there-plenty-more-tank#:~:text=Three%2Dtime%20Grand%20Slam%20champion,the%20biggest%20one%20of%20all%3F%E2%80%9D) three years ago to the day, the same year the Welshman was crowned champion. Last time out, Dolan had displayed all of his battling qualities to [defeat best friend Mickey Mansell](https://www.balls.ie/darts/mickey-mansell-brendan-dolan-world-darts-championship-582677), and it was more of the same for Dolan tonight who defeated Price despite having the lower average. There was bedlam in the Ally Pally as Dolan finished off the victory. Price divided the crowd as per usual, but Dolan's gutsy win had the crowd off its feet. Take a bow Brendan Dolan üëè A win to remember for The History Maker üéØ [pic.twitter.com/Dg9t5rs3iS] ‚Äî Sky Sports Darts (@SkySportsDarts) [December 28, 2023] Brendan Dolan and Gerwyn Price respond after epic Dolan win Dolan told Sky Sports after the win that he relied on positive thinking as Price battled back. "I was trying to tell myself positive things, you know, 'who cares if he wins it, you're holding your own throw. You can still do this, you're still in the game" Brendan Dolan was forthright speaking to reporters after the victory in speaking about the third and fourth sets where Price was not his ruthless self He said: 'I suppose Gezzy didn't play as well as he could have. He definitely gave me a few sets, well, a set early on.' üó£Ô∏è "I'm here to win, and I'm ready to fight!" Hear the thoughts of Brendan Dolan, who produced an inspired display of finishing to dump out 2021 champion Gerwyn Price and progress to the last 16... [pic.twitter.com/4nE9QXS4Bs] ‚Äî PDC Darts (@OfficialPDC) [December 28, 2023] Price was magnanimous in a statement on instagram, saying: Absolutely gutted with chances I gave away with tonight, trying hard and beating myself up just wanna say how much I appreciate the crown [sic] getting behind me, just couldn't get a flow and Brendan took every chance I gave him, well done to him and hopefully I'll learn from this. #gutted But once again thank you. The buildup to the competition featured talk of Price saying he might skip it entirely and calling for a venue change. Dolan will now play the winner of Boris Krcmar and Gary Anderson in the Round of 16 either December 29 or 30.

author: @pradeepviswav
title: After 15 years of secrecy, Microsoft unveils Azure's actual revenue - Neowin
text:
Microsoft first announced its cloud computing platform under the name "Windows Azure" at the Microsoft PDC in October 2008. Later, Azure officially went live on February 1, 2010. In the 15 years since its launch, Microsoft has never disclosed Azure‚Äôs standalone revenue. Instead, its financials were always combined with other commercial products and services, making it difficult to assess Azure‚Äôs true performance.
Today, Microsoft announced its earnings for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. As part of the results, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella finally revealed that Azure surpassed $75 billion in revenue in the fiscal year ended June 30, 2025, up 34 percent year-over-year, driven by growth across all workloads.
For comparison, AWS generated around $108 billion in cloud revenue in 2024, and based on early 2025 results, it is trending toward an annual run rate of approximately $117 billion. Azure is still $42 billion behind AWS in annual revenue, which is about a 36% gap. If both maintain their current growth rates, it would take Azure around 3 to 4 years to catch up.
Recently, Google reported its Q2 2025 earnings. According to the results, Google Cloud generated $13.6 billion in revenue, reflecting 32% year-over-year growth and an annualized run rate exceeding $54 billion. This indicates that Azure remains significantly larger than Google Cloud in terms of annual revenue but still trails well behind the market leader, AWS.
Microsoft CFO Amy Hood said the following during the earnings call webcast:
"Commercial remaining performance obligation increased to $368 billion, up 37% (and 35% in constant currency). Roughly 35% will be recognized as revenue in the next 12 months, up 21% year-over-year. The remaining portion, to be recognized beyond the next 12 months, increased by 49%. And this quarter, our annuity mix was again 98%."
She also mentioned that, while Microsoft brought additional datacenter capacity online this quarter, demand continues to outpace supply. These factors indicate that Azure is likely to maintain its strong growth momentum in the coming quarters. To support this growth, Microsoft expects to spend over $30 billion in capital expenditures in the next quarter alone.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology
Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Samantha Wiley
title: Health app revamp expected in iOS 19.4
text:
Apple is planning a major refresh of its Health app in line with the release of iOS 19.4.
Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman said that Apple might have a new health coaching feature for the app and it will be powered by AI. The feature will have personalized health recommendations per user. In addition, the app will have videos made by health experts that provide helpful information to the user, and it will contain recommendations for lifestyle improvements. The analyst cited an example where a video could tell the user about heart disease risks when there‚Äôs a history of poor heart rate. He noted that the feature could be integrated into Apple‚Äôs Health+ service.
iOS 19.4‚Äôs Health app is also expected to feature food tracking, and it‚Äôs believed to compete directly with MyFitnessPal, as per Gurman. An AI-powered coaching feature can provide fitness tips to improve workout techniques, for example.

author: La Stampa
title: Papa Francesco all‚ÄôAngelus: affetto e gratitudine per Ratzinger. Ucraina e Russia, Gaza e Israele: ‚ÄúChi ha interesse nella guerra ascolti la coscienza‚Äù - La Stampa
text:
CITT√Ä DEL VATICANO. ¬´Un anno fa Papa Benedetto XVI concludeva il suo cammino terreno, dopo aver servito con amore e sapienza la Chiesa. Sentiamo per lui tanto affetto, tanta gratitudine, tanta ammirazione. Dal Cielo ci benedica e ci accompagni¬ª. Papa Francesco lo dice all'ultimo Angelus del 2023 chiedendo ai fedeli in piazza San Pietro ¬´un applauso¬ª per Joseph Ratzinger. Il Pontefice rinnova l‚Äôappello alla pace nel mondo: ¬´Continuiamo a pregare per i popoli che soffrono a causa delle guerre. Il martoriato popolo ucraino, i popoli palestinesi e israeliani, il popolo sudanese e tanti altri. Chi ha interessi in questi conflitti ascolti la voce della coscienza¬ª.
Il Vescovo di Roma si affaccia alla finestra dello studio nel Palazzo apostolico per recitare la Preghiera mariana.
Nell‚Äôintroduzione afferma: ¬´Cari fratelli e sorelle, buongiorno! Oggi celebriamo la festa della Santa Famiglia di Ges√π, Maria e Giuseppe¬ª. Il Vangelo ¬´ce la mostra al tempio di Gerusalemme, per la presentazione del Bambino al Signore. Arriva al tempio e l√¨ porta in dono l‚Äôofferta pi√π umile e semplice tra quelle previste, a testimonianza della sua povert√†. Infine, Maria riceve una profezia: ‚ÄúA te una spada trafigger√† l‚Äôanima‚Äù. Arrivano nella povert√† e ripartono con un carico di sofferenza. Ci√≤ desta sorpresa: ma come, la Famiglia di Ges√π, l‚Äôunica famiglia della storia che pu√≤ vantare in s√© stessa la presenza di Dio in carne e ossa, anzich√© essere ricca √® povera! Anzich√© essere agevolata, sembra ostacolata! Anzich√© essere priva di fatiche, √® immersa in grandi dolori!¬ª.
Jorge Mario Bergoglio si domanda: ¬´Che cosa dice questo alle nostre famiglie, questo modo di vivere, la storia della Santa Famiglia, povera, ostacolata, con grandi dolori? Ci dice una cosa molto bella: Dio, che spesso immaginiamo stia al di l√† dei problemi, √® venuto ad abitare la nostra vita con i suoi problemi. Lui ci ha salvato cos√¨: non √® venuto gi√† adulto, ma piccolissimo; ha vissuto in famiglia, figlio di una mamma e di un pap√†; l√¨ ha trascorso la maggior parte del suo tempo, crescendo, imparando, in una vita fatta di quotidianit√†, nascondimento e silenzio¬ª. E non evita ¬´le difficolt√†, anzi, scegliendo una famiglia, una famiglia ‚Äúesperta nel soffrire‚Äù, e dice alle nostre famiglie: ‚ÄúSe vi trovate in difficolt√†, io so che cosa provate, l‚Äôho vissuto: io, mia madre e mio padre l‚Äôabbiamo provato per dire anche alla vostra famiglia: non siete soli!‚Äù. Giuseppe e Maria ‚Äúsi stupivano delle cose che si dicevano di Ges√π‚Äù, perch√© non pensavano che ci fossero il vecchio Simeone e la profetessa Anna a dire queste cose. Si stupivano. E voglio fermarmi su questo oggi: sulla capacit√† di stupore. La capacit√† di stupore √® un segreto per andare avanti bene in famiglia. Non abituarsi all‚Äôordinariet√† delle cose. Sapersi anzitutto stupire di Dio, che ci accompagna¬ª. E poi, ¬´stupirsi in famiglia¬ª. Il Papa sostiene che ¬´√® bene nella coppia sapersi stupire del proprio coniuge, ad esempio prendendolo per mano e guardandolo negli occhi alla sera per qualche istante, con tenerezza: lo stupore ti porta alla tenerezza, sempre. √à bella la tenerezza nel matrimonio. E poi stupirsi del miracolo della vita, dei figli, trovando il tempo per giocare con loro e per ascoltarli¬ª.
Francesco chiede ¬´a voi, padri e madri: trovate del tempo per giocare con i figli? Per portarli a passeggiare?¬ª. Bergoglio racconta che ieri ha parlato al telefono con una persona ¬´e le ho chiesto: ‚ÄúDove sei?‚Äù ‚Äì ‚ÄúSono in piazza, ho portato a passeggiare i miei figli‚Äù. √à una bella paternit√† e maternit√†, questa. E poi, stupirsi della saggezza dei nonni. Tante volte, noi i nonni li tiriamo fuori dalla vita. No, i nonni sono fonti di saggezza. Impariamo a stupirci della saggezza dei nonni, della loro storia. I nonni che riportano la vita all‚Äôessenziale. E stupirsi, infine, della propria storia d‚Äôamore ‚Äì ognuno di noi ha la propria: il Signore ci ha fatto camminare con amore, stupirsi di questo. La nostra vita ha sicuramente degli aspetti negativi, ma stupirsi anche della bont√† di Dio di camminare con noi, anche se noi siamo cos√¨ inesperti¬ª.
Il Pontefice invoca ¬´Maria, Regina della famiglia¬ª, affinch√© ¬´ci aiuti a stupirci: chiediamo oggi la grazia dello stupore. La Madonna ci aiuti a stupirci ogni giorno del bene e a sapere insegnare agli altri la bellezza dello stupore¬ª.
Dopo l‚ÄôAngelus, papa Francesco costata che ¬´purtroppo la celebrazione del Natale in Nigeria √® stata segnata da gravi violenze nello Stato di Plateau, con molte vittime. Prego per loro e per le loro famiglie. Che Dio liberi la Nigeria da questi orrori! E prego anche per quanti hanno perso la vita nell‚Äôesplosione di un camion-cisterna in Liberia¬ª.
Esorta poi a continuare ¬´a pregare per i popoli che soffrono a causa delle guerre: il martoriato popolo ucraino, i popoli palestinese e israeliano, il popolo sudanese e tanti altri. Al termine di un anno, si abbia il coraggio di chiedersi: quante vite umane sono state spezzate dai conflitti armati? Quanti morti? E quante distruzioni, quanta sofferenza, quanta povert√†? Chi ha interessi in questi conflitti, ascolti la voce della coscienza. E non dimentichiamo i martoriati Rohingya!¬ª.
Ricorda che ¬´un anno fa Papa Benedetto XVI concludeva il suo cammino terreno, dopo aver servito con amore e sapienza la Chiesa. Sentiamo per lui tanto affetto, tanta gratitudine, tanta ammirazione. Dal Cielo ci benedica e ci accompagni. Un applauso a Benedetto XVI!¬ª.
Oggi rivolge ¬´un saluto speciale alle famiglie qui presenti e a quelle collegate mediante la televisione e gli altri mezzi di comunicazione. Non dimentichiamo che la famiglia √® la cellula fondamentale della societ√†: bisogna sempre difenderla e sostenerla, sempre!¬ª.
E a tutti ¬´auguro una buona domenica. Una benedizione alle vostre famiglie! E auguro anche un fine anno sereno. Per favore, non dimenticatevi di pregare per me. Buon pranzo e arrivederci!¬ª.
Leggi i commenti I commenti dei lettori Video del giorno Un anno dalla morte di papa Benedetto XVI, Ratzinger il conservatore che ha rivoluzionato la Chiesa

author: Sputnik Africa
title: UAE Allocates $5Mln in Humanitarian Aid to Sudan, UAE Foreign Ministry Says - 22.06.2024, Sputnik Africa
text: UAE Allocates $5Mln in Humanitarian Aid to Sudan, UAE Foreign Ministry Says Subscribe MOSCOW (Sputnik) - In April, at the International Humanitarian Conference for Sudan and Neighbouring Countries, the UAE committed to providing $100 million to Sudan via UN agencies. Last week, the UAE Foreign Ministry said that 70% of the pledged sum had been allocated. "The United Arab Emirates has signed an agreement with the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA) to allocate USD 5 million to support the Sudan Humanitarian Fund (SHF)," the ministry said in a statement on Friday. The UN undersecretary for humanitarian affairs, Martin Griffiths, was quoted as saying that "with this allocation, we can bolster our [lifesaving support](https://en.sputniknews.africa/20240618/blinken-saudi-foreign-minister-discuss-action-to-end-sudan-war-us-state-department-says-1067092880.html)to families and communities caught up in Sudan's unprecedented humanitarian crisis." On April 15, 2023, clashes broke out between the Sudanese army and paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF). The parties to the conflict have since introduced a number of temporary nationwide ceasefires, but none has helped settle the conflict.

organizations.name: united nations office for the coordination of humanitarian affairs

author: Michael Harradence
title: Is Lethal Company Coming To PS5?
text:
Is Lethal Company Coming To
PS5? Developed by solo coder Zeekerss, Lethal Company has been drumming up positive reviews on Steam following its release into Early Access on October 23, 2023, leaving many folk to question if it‚Äôs coming to consoles or not. Is a Lethal Company PS5 release on the cards? Let‚Äôs find out!
Is Lethal Company Coming To PS5?
There‚Äôs been no official announcement regarding Lethal Company coming to PS5 or Xbox Series X/S at this point. The game has only just entered early access for the PC, so if a console version was planned, it probably wouldn‚Äôt happen until the full version of the game is available. After all, Lethal Company is still technically in development, so don‚Äôt expect a PS5 version to see the light of day for a while.
What Is Lethal Company?
Here‚Äôs the official blurb:
You are a contracted worker for the Company. Your job is to collect scrap from abandoned, industrialized moons to meet the Company‚Äôs profit quota. You can use the cash you earn to travel to new moons with higher risks and rewards‚Äìor you can buy fancy suits and decorations for your ship. Experience nature, scanning any creature you find to add them to your bestiary. Explore the wondrous outdoors and rummage through their derelict, steel and concrete underbellies. Just never miss the quota.

author: none@none.com (Recorder Report)
title: OGDCL, Al-Shifa hold free surgical eye camp in Chakwal
text: ISLAMABAD: The Oil and Gas Development Company Limited (OGDCL), as part of its corporate social responsibility (CSR) initiatives, organised a three-day Free Surgical Eye Camp at its CSR Dispensary in Chak Naurang, located in the Chakwal district of Punjab in collaboration with the Al-Shifa Eye Trust Hospital. The eye camp, held from December 24 to 26, aimed at providing essential eye care services to the local community. During the free eye camp, a total number of 1,290 patients were screened at the OPD and received essential preliminary assessments. Among them, 762 patients were provided with vision glasses, and 40 patients received post-operation dark glasses. Special glasses were provided to 285 patients, addressing specific visual needs. Moreover, 55 patients underwent Lab/Covid-19 tests during the camp. Furthermore, a total number of 40 eye surgeries were performed, contributing to the long-term improvement of the patients‚Äô eye health. Patients who availed themselves of the services expressed their complete satisfaction with the overall process at the eye camp. The OGDCL, under its CSR programme, covered all expenses incurred during the three-day camp, including laser/phaco surgery, provision of vision glasses, and medicines. The OGDCL is committed to enhancing the health and well-being of communities in and around its operational areas. Through corporate social responsibility initiatives, the OGDCL aims to positively impact the lives of residents and contribute to the overall prosperity of the regions it serves. The executive director (HR/Admin) and general manager (CSR) of the OGDCL also visited the eye camp site and met with staff of eye camp and also patients and other community members. The local community thanked the OGDCL for providing the facility at their doorstep. Copyright Business Recorder, 2023 Comments First half of Jan‚Äô24: POL products‚Äô prices may be sustained OGDCL, Al-Shifa hold free surgical eye camp in Chakwal Solar panel imports: PCA South uncovers another money laundering offence Sindh: Bilawal says nomination papers not being snatched Dozens arrested in pro-Palestinian protests at two major US airports ECP directs Punjab govt to ensure a level playing field ECP accepts Nawaz‚Äôs nomination papers Army commits to offering support for elections Imported coal-based projects: ECC okays settlement of issues with PQEPCL Anti-polio drive: PM seeks Ulema‚Äôs help FD Outlook misreports FBR collection data WAPDA employees: PHC suspends notification to end free electricity Read more stories Next Story
